errors.500: Internal server error, please try again later

helper.uid: How others will search you. Choose it carefully, because you won't have the abillity to change it after is set.
helper.username: Your real name, will be displayed in your profile.
helper.date_of_birth: This won't be visible to the public.
helper.six_digit: A 6-digit code has been sent to the email you have provided.

error.uid_format: Allowed characters: latin letters, numbers, dashes. The first and last character cannot be a dash.
error.birthday_limit: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services
error.invalid_token: Invalid token, please make a new request
error.message_text_length: Message length must be up to 500

search.title: Search
search.search_posts_field_subtext: Enter keywords, #hashtags or @mentions in the search field to get some results.
search.search_users_field_subtext: Enter a username or a uid in the search field to get some results.
search.found_nothing: We found nothing matching the given terms

search_tips.heading: Search Tips
search_tips.tip_1: Be careful of wrong syntax or misspelled words

followings.title: People %user% follows on Ferman
followings.no_users: There are no users followed by %user%

delete_dialog.title: Are you sure?
delete_dialog.text: Clicking "Delete" button, all likes and replies of this post will be deleted. Any further action will not be able to be undone.

posts.title: Explore new posts
posts.no_posts: I'm sad to report you that there are no posts.

users.title: Explore users
users.no_users_location: There are no users matching this location

my_account.title: My Account
my_account.private_info_subtext: These information are not visible in the public.
my_account.delete_account_subtext: This will completely remove your account and anything that's associated with it (posts, comments, likes, etc). Be careful with this, any action cannot be undone. Deleting your account requires your password.

chat.title: My Chats
chat.no_messages: There are no messages here yet...

errors.chat_already_exists: A chat between you and this user already exists

message.phase1_success: An email has been sent to the email address you've given. There, are instructions on how to continue setting up your account.
message.phase2_invalid: The provided code is not valid

success_alert.title: Your account is finally ready!
success_alert.body: We're happy to announce you that your account is ready! What are you waiting for? Start posting!

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.subtext: Deleting your account, requires you to pass a two-factor authentication process to proove you are the owner of this account.
delete_account.password_helper: Enter your password to prove your identity.

message.phase1_success: An email has been sent to your email address. There, are instructions on how to proceed.
message.phase2_invalid: The provided code is not valid

confirm_modal.title: After this, there's no comeback.
confirm_modal.body: By deleting your account, all your posts, comments, likes will be deleted. Any action cannot be undone, it will be permanent.

success_alert.title: Your account is deleted!
success_alert.body: Your account is finally deleted. Hope we see you again!

message.success: If a user exists with this email, an email has been sent with instructions.

success_alert.title: Your password has been reset!
success_alert.body: We're happy to announce you that your password has been reset!

error.new_pwd_defer_from_old: New password must defer from old

404_page.title: Page not found
404_page.heading: Page not found
404_page.subtext:
The page you're trying to reach, doesn't exist.
You've been redirected somewhere safe.

503_page.title: Access Denied
503_page.heading: Access Denied
503_page.subtext:
